entry.title: Go for a walk and brainstorm ideas.
what is mathematics
entry.content:
• The science of numbers and shapes

  • My idea of mathematics is exploring and the process of understanding patterns in the universe

  • Life is full of patterns

  • Math is a tool discoverd by humans

Human Intelligence aims to adapt to new environments by utilizing a combination of different cognitive processes

  • Mathematics is the language in which we express rigorous ideas and study the logical consequences of these ideas.

  • Physicists want answers, and the way they get answers is by doing computations

  • Using AI is more efficient to solve problems using math due to time and complexitie

    Artificial Intelligence aims to build machines that can mimic human behavior and perform human-like actions

  • Deep math trench
    Image

  • If you find a simple solution to something, that might not be the best solution.

  • Evolution is not necessarily an optimizer. It‚Äôs a tinkerer. How much of it is due to just accidents

  • Video -Corina tarnita

  • Evolutionary Dynamics: Exploring the Equations of Life ~Martin A Nowak
